entities.name: COMPANY
entities.description: The Company referred to in the document that issues shares and awards under the Plan.

entities.name: SERVICE RECIPIENT
entities.description: The entity receiving services, which is associated with the Company.

entities.name: AFFILIATE
entities.description: An organization related to the Company, possibly involved in the Plan.

relationships.relationship_description: The Company is associated with the Service Recipient for purposes of service and awards.
The Company is related to the Affiliate, which might be involved in the Plan.
The Service Recipient is related to the Affiliate, both associated with the Company.
